alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Charles City, western New Kent, east central Henrico and southeastern Hanover Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highland Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bottoms Bridge and Tunstall around 105 PM EDT. Roxbury, Talleysville and Providence Forge around 115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Richmond International, Wrights Corner, Quinton, Fair Oaks, Browns Corner, Mountcastle, Orapax Farms, Elko, Montrose and Sandston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent
